title: Know Me When the Sun Goes Down
description: From Bestselling Paranormal Romance author Lisa Olsen - Book Twelve of the Forged Bloodlines seriesI can't tell you what happens in this book. All can say is, pour yourself a shot of aquavit, grab a box of tissues, and hang on. It's gonna be a bumpy ride. And nothing will ever be the same again.
author: Lisa Olsen
